title: Shoppers Say These Are the Best 7 Grocery Items for Your ...

article.title: Shoppers Say These Are the Best 7 Grocery Items for Your ...
article.description: bgwalker / iStock.com Americans are now spending over 23% more on food than they did just a few years ago, as grocery prices rose 23.6% from 2020 to 2024, according to the U.S. Department of Agriculture’s Economic Research Service. With grocery prices still straining budgets, many shoppers are turning to Walmart for affordable grocery staples. Read Next: 11 Best New Groceries on Sale at Costco in July Explore More: 6 Things You Must Do When Your Savings Reach $50,000 For those who want to save money on groceries, shoppers and experts point to these seven items as some of the best value picks at Walmart. Trending Now: Suze Orman's Secret to a Wealthy Retirement--Have You Made This Money Move? Great Value Canned Goods Laurie Hise, founder of Passionate Penny Pincher, stands behind the Great Value canned goods at Walmart. “Your pantry becomes a savings palace with beans, broths and even canned fruits, perfect for those $5 dinner nights!” Hise wrote in an email. For example, one option is Great Value’s fire-roasted tomatoes, which Hise noted have a great taste and cook beautifully. Plus, they’re often cheaper than other brands. And other Walmart shoppers agree. A full 78% of the item’s reviews are five out of five stars, with customers highlighting the good taste and low price. Read Next: 7 Canned Foods Frugal People Always Put in Their Grocery Cart Syrup and Pancake Mix Combos Looking for a sweet, affordable breakfast option? Syrup and pancake mix combos are deals you can’t find elsewhere. “Walmart’s combo pricing for Great Value pancake mix and syrup often beats other big box stores by $1-$2 per combo,” Hise wrote. Meat Department Rollbacks Now this is where Walmart wins against traditional grocery stores. “Bone-in chicken thighs are often under $1.25 per pound and beat grocery stores,” Hise explained. “These are great for freezer meal preps like barbecue chicken, one-sheet pan dinners and slow-cooker tacos.” Dairy Deals Dairy prices can fluctuate, but Walmart typical
